info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 10:32PM CDT until March 29 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN THROCKMORTON COUNTY... At 1031 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just southwest of Throckmorton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Elbert around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 183 Near The Throckmorton- Baylor County Line and The Intersection Of Us-380 And Highway 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
